overview: Manager of all things Marketing at boxPAY. Facilitating everything from global-scale trade shows, to managing all press and advertising, she makes sure to get the news about boxPAY out to the tech world! Utilizing her marketing agency background and experience working in North America and Europe, she has a passion for communication and a knack for discovering industry trends. She has her BS in Advertising from the University of Illinois-Urbana/Champaign and has studied at Dublin City University.
